CUSTOM.name: TkrTrigger_Tower_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Number of tracker triggers per tower

CUSTOM.name: CalHiTrigger_Tower_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower

CUSTOM.name: CalLoTrigger_Tower_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Number of Cal LO triggers per tower

CUSTOM.name: AcdGemROI_Tower_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Number of ACD ROI per tower
CUSTOM.caption: This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.

CUSTOM.name: Acd_GemVeto_AcdTile_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Number of Acd Gem vetoes by tile
CUSTOM.caption: Expect to see spikes at 15, 31, 47, 63. These are large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.

CUSTOM.name: AcdGemCNO_GARC_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Number of Acd CNO by board
CUSTOM.caption: This bit is the OR of the CNO signal on a single board. Because of the tile to boad mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal

CUSTOM.name: CalLogEndRangeHitCounter_Range0_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of hits in each Cal log end for range 0 (LEX8)

CUSTOM.name: CalLogEndRangeHitCounter_Range1_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of hits in each Cal log end for range 1 (LEX1)

CUSTOM.name: CalLogEndRangeHitCounter_Range2_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of hits in each Cal log end for range 2 (HEX8)

CUSTOM.name: CalLogEndRangeHitCounter_Range3_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of hits in each Cal log end for range 3 (HEX1)

CUSTOM.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account

CUSTOM.name: ZeroCalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account

TH1F.name: CalX_Total_NHit_TH1
TH1F.title: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included)
TH1F.xlabel: Number of CalX_Hits

TH1F.name: CalX_NHit_TH1
TH1F.title: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event in this tower
TH1F.xlabel: Number of Cal crystals in this tower

TH1F.name: CalTower_NHit_TH1
TH1F.title: Number of CAL modules hit
TH1F.xlabel: Number of Cal Towers Hit

TH1F.name: TkrTotalHits_TH1
TH1F.title: Distribution of strip hits per event (all towers included)
TH1F.xlabel: Number of strip hits

CUSTOM.name: ZeroTkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Counter of ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane
CUSTOM.caption: Number of times there are no strip hits in a Tracker plane

CUSTOM.name: TkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Overall number of hits vs. TKR tower and plane
CUSTOM.caption: Test

CUSTOM.name: TkrHitsCounter_Plane_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Overall number of hits vs. TKR plane (one per tower)
CUSTOM.caption: Watch out for spikes (but don't get too excited, most likely it's just a noisy strip) and dips

CUSTOM.name: TkrHitsCounter_PlaneGTFE_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Overall number of hits vs. TKR plane and front-end chip (one per tower)
CUSTOM.caption: Watch out for white spots---front end chips with no hits---if the statistics is enough

outputList.name: TKR Details - Strip hits per tower

TH1F.name: TkrHits_TH1
TH1F.title: Distribution of strip hits per tower
TH1F.xlabel: Number of strip hits

outputList.name: TKR Details - Planes hit in a tower

CUSTOM.name: TkrPlanesHit_TH1
CUSTOM.title: Distribution of the number of planes hit in a tower

CUSTOM.name: ToT_0_WhenTkrHitsExist_TowerPlane_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number of times that, existing at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controllers

TH1F.name: TkrTotalHits_Periodic_TH1
TH1F.title: Distribution of strip hits per event (all towers included). Periodic triggers only
TH1F.xlabel: Number of strip hits

TH1F.name: AcdChannelsHits_TH1
TH1F.title: Number of ACD PMT hit per event
TH1F.xlabel: N
TH1F.caption: This is the number of PHA values per event

CUSTOM.name: AcdHitsCounter_CableChannel_TH2
CUSTOM.title: Number hit for each ACD channel
